sense.gloss: to scatter, to sprinkle, to strew
to distribute (handbills, etc.), to spread (rumours, etc.)
to give the slip, to throw off, to shake off, to lose
to dump (e.g. onto the floor), to empty by overturning, to throw out (contents)
to tell everything, to reveal everything, to open one's heart, to spill out
to scatter, to sprinkle, to spray, to strew
scattering parched beans (to drive out evil spirits)

sdata.j: ジムは↑庭↑↓にわ↓に↑水↑↓みず↓を↑撒↑↓ま↓いている。
↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑息子↑↓むすこ↓に↑芝生↑↓しばふ↓に↑水↑↓みず↓を↑撒↑↓ま↓かせた。
sdata.e: I had my son water the lawn.

sdata.j: ↑床↑↓ゆか↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑面↑↓めん↓に↑新聞紙↑↓しんぶんし↓が↑撒↑↓ま↓き↑散↑↓ち↓らされていた。
sdata.e: Newspapers lay scattered all over the floor.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はホースを↑使↑↓つか↓って↑庭↑↓にわ↓に↑水↑↓みず↓を↑撒↑↓ま↓いていました。
sdata.e: He was watering his garden with a hose.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓を↑粉々↑↓こなごな↓に↑引↑↓ひ↓き↑裂↑↓さ↓いて↑窓↑↓まど↓からばら↑撒↑↓ま↓いた。
sdata.e: He tore up his letter into small bits and threw them out the window.

sdata.j: ↑農業↑↓のうぎょう↓↑家↑↓か↓が↑小麦↑↓こむぎ↓の↑種↑↓たね↓を↑畑↑↓はたけ↓に↑撒↑↓ま↓いた。
sdata.e: The farmer seeded the field with wheat.

sdata.j: ↑農業↑↓のうぎょう↓↑家↑↓か↓が↑小麦↑↓こむぎ↓の↑種↑↓たね↓を↑畑↑↓はたけ↓に↑撒↑↓ま↓いた。
sdata.e: The farmer scattered the wheat seeds in the field.

words.gloss: to scatter, to sprinkle, to strew
